basic.floral_language:
Cephalocereus senilis 
Floriography: strong, kind, persistent.
Succulent stem of the Cephalocereus senilis is oval and palm shaped, thick and juicy. Leaves reduce to long needle spines. Because it is almost care free, Cephalocereus senilis is very popular and could be found on desktop, tea table, bedroom and office.
Cephalocereus senilis requires direct bright sunlight for growth. It blooms in certain conditions. Flower color could be light yellow, orange or pink.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers with a short period flowering time 2-3 days
basic.color: Green, flower color light yellow, orange, pink

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes strong light, put in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce watering in winter dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring to autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
